ApplicationCodeConfiguration.description: Describes code configuration for an application.

properties.name: CodeContent
properties.description: The location and type of the application code.

type.description: The location and type of the application code.

properties.name: CodeContentType
properties.description: Specifies whether the code content is in text or zip format.

type.description: Specifies whether the code content is in text or zip format.

ApplicationConfiguration.description: Specifies the creation parameters for a Kinesis Data Analytics application.

properties.name: ApplicationCodeConfiguration
properties.description: The code location and type parameters for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

type.description: The code location and type parameters for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

properties.name: ApplicationSnapshotConfiguration
properties.description: Describes whether snapshots are enabled for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

type.description: Describes whether snapshots are enabled for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

properties.name: EnvironmentProperties
properties.description: Describes execution properties for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

type.description: Describes execution properties for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

properties.name: FlinkApplicationConfiguration
properties.description: The creation and update parameters for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

type.description: The creation and update parameters for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

properties.name: SqlApplicationConfiguration
properties.description: The creation and update parameters for a SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

type.description: The creation and update parameters for a SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

properties.name: VpcConfigurations
properties.description: The array of descriptions of VPC configurations available to the application.

type.description: The array of descriptions of VPC configurations available to the application.

properties.name: ZeppelinApplicationConfiguration
properties.description: The configuration parameters for a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook.

type.description: The configuration parameters for a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook.

ApplicationMaintenanceConfiguration.description: Describes the maintenance configuration for the application.

properties.name: ApplicationMaintenanceWindowStartTime
properties.description: The start time for the maintenance window.

type.description: The start time for the maintenance window.

ApplicationRestoreConfiguration.description: Describes the restore behavior of a restarting application.

properties.name: ApplicationRestoreType
properties.description: Specifies how the application should be restored.

type.description: Specifies how the application should be restored.

properties.name: SnapshotName
properties.description: The identifier of an existing snapshot of application state to use to restart an application. The application uses this value if RESTORE_FROM_CUSTOM_SNAPSHOT is specified for the ApplicationRestoreType.

type.description: The identifier of an existing snapshot of application state to use to restart an application. The application uses this value if RESTORE_FROM_CUSTOM_SNAPSHOT is specified for the ApplicationRestoreType.

ApplicationSnapshotConfiguration.description: Describes whether snapshots are enabled for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

properties.name: SnapshotsEnabled
properties.description: Describes whether snapshots are enabled for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

type.description: Describes whether snapshots are enabled for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

CSVMappingParameters.description:
For a SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application, provides additional mapping information when the record format uses delimiters, such as CSV. For example, the following sample records use CSV format, where the records use the '\n' as the row delimiter and a comma (",") as the column delimiter:
`"name1", "address1"`
`"name2", "address2"`

properties.name: RecordColumnDelimiter
properties.description: The column delimiter. For example, in a CSV format, a comma (",") is the typical column delimiter.

type.description: The column delimiter. For example, in a CSV format, a comma (",") is the typical column delimiter.

properties.name: RecordRowDelimiter
properties.description: The row delimiter. For example, in a CSV format, '\n' is the typical row delimiter.

type.description: The row delimiter. For example, in a CSV format, '\n' is the typical row delimiter.

CatalogConfiguration.description: The configuration parameters for the default Amazon Glue database. You use this database for SQL queries that you write in a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook.

properties.name: GlueDataCatalogConfiguration
properties.description: The configuration parameters for the default Amazon Glue database. You use this database for Apache Flink SQL queries and table API transforms that you write in a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook.

type.description: The configuration parameters for the default Amazon Glue database. You use this database for Apache Flink SQL queries and table API transforms that you write in a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook.

CheckpointConfiguration.description: Describes an application's checkpointing configuration. Checkpointing is the process of persisting application state for fault tolerance. For more information, see Checkpoints for Fault Tolerance in the Apache Flink Documentation.

properties.name: CheckpointInterval
properties.description: Describes the interval in milliseconds between checkpoint operations.

type.description: Describes the interval in milliseconds between checkpoint operations.

properties.name: CheckpointingEnabled
properties.description: Describes whether checkpointing is enabled for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

type.description: Describes whether checkpointing is enabled for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

properties.name: ConfigurationType
properties.description: Describes whether the application uses Kinesis Data Analytics' default checkpointing behavior. You must set this property to `CUSTOM` in order to set the `CheckpointingEnabled`, `CheckpointInterval`, or `MinPauseBetweenCheckpoints` parameters.

type.description: Describes whether the application uses Kinesis Data Analytics' default checkpointing behavior. You must set this property to `CUSTOM` in order to set the `CheckpointingEnabled`, `CheckpointInterval`, or `MinPauseBetweenCheckpoints` parameters.

properties.name: MinPauseBetweenCheckpoints
properties.description: Describes the minimum time in milliseconds after a checkpoint operation completes that a new checkpoint operation can start. If a checkpoint operation takes longer than the CheckpointInterval, the application otherwise performs continual checkpoint operations. For more information, see Tuning Checkpointing in the Apache Flink Documentation.

type.description: Describes the minimum time in milliseconds after a checkpoint operation completes that a new checkpoint operation can start. If a checkpoint operation takes longer than the CheckpointInterval, the application otherwise performs continual checkpoint operations. For more information, see Tuning Checkpointing in the Apache Flink Documentation.

CodeContent.description: Specifies either the application code, or the location of the application code, for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

properties.name: S3ContentLocation
properties.description: Information about the Amazon S3 bucket that contains the application code.

type.description: Information about the Amazon S3 bucket that contains the application code.

properties.name: TextContent
properties.description: The text-format code for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

type.description: The text-format code for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

properties.name: ZipFileContent
properties.description: The zip-format code for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

type.description: The zip-format code for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

CustomArtifactConfiguration.description: The configuration of connectors and user-defined functions.

properties.name: ArtifactType
properties.description: Set this to either `UDF` or `DEPENDENCY_JAR`. `UDF` stands for user-defined functions. This type of artifact must be in an S3 bucket. A `DEPENDENCY_JAR` can be in either Maven or an S3 bucket.

type.description: Set this to either `UDF` or `DEPENDENCY_JAR`. `UDF` stands for user-defined functions. This type of artifact must be in an S3 bucket. A `DEPENDENCY_JAR` can be in either Maven or an S3 bucket.

properties.name: MavenReference
properties.description: The parameters required to fully specify a Maven reference.

type.description: The parameters required to fully specify a Maven reference.

properties.name: S3ContentLocation
properties.description: The location of the custom artifacts.

type.description: The location of the custom artifacts.

itemType.description: The configuration of connectors and user-defined functions.

DeployAsApplicationConfiguration.description: The information required to deploy a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook as an application with durable state.

properties.name: S3ContentLocation
properties.description: The description of an Amazon S3 object that contains the Amazon Data Analytics application, including the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the S3 bucket, the name of the Amazon S3 object that contains the data, and the version number of the Amazon S3 object that contains the data.

type.description: The description of an Amazon S3 object that contains the Amazon Data Analytics application, including the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the S3 bucket, the name of the Amazon S3 object that contains the data, and the version number of the Amazon S3 object that contains the data.

EnvironmentProperties.description: Describes execution properties for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

properties.name: PropertyGroups
properties.description: Describes the execution property groups.

type.description: Describes the execution property groups.

FlinkApplicationConfiguration.description: Describes configuration parameters for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application or a Studio notebook.

properties.name: CheckpointConfiguration
properties.description: Describes an application's checkpointing configuration. Checkpointing is the process of persisting application state for fault tolerance. For more information, see Checkpoints for Fault Tolerance in the Apache Flink Documentation.

type.description: Describes an application's checkpointing configuration. Checkpointing is the process of persisting application state for fault tolerance. For more information, see Checkpoints for Fault Tolerance in the Apache Flink Documentation.

properties.name: MonitoringConfiguration
properties.description: Describes configuration parameters for Amazon CloudWatch logging for an application.

type.description: Describes configuration parameters for Amazon CloudWatch logging for an application.

properties.name: ParallelismConfiguration
properties.description: Describes parameters for how an application executes multiple tasks simultaneously.

type.description: Describes parameters for how an application executes multiple tasks simultaneously.

FlinkRunConfiguration.description: Describes the starting parameters for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

properties.name: AllowNonRestoredState
properties.description: When restoring from a snapshot, specifies whether the runtime is allowed to skip a state that cannot be mapped to the new program. Defaults to false. If you update your application without specifying this parameter, AllowNonRestoredState will be set to false, even if it was previously set to true.

type.description: When restoring from a snapshot, specifies whether the runtime is allowed to skip a state that cannot be mapped to the new program. Defaults to false. If you update your application without specifying this parameter, AllowNonRestoredState will be set to false, even if it was previously set to true.

GlueDataCatalogConfiguration.description: The configuration of the Glue Data Catalog that you use for Apache Flink SQL queries and table API transforms that you write in an application.

properties.name: DatabaseARN
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the database.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the database.

Input.description: When you configure the application input for a SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application, you specify the streaming source, the in-application stream name that is created, and the mapping between the two.

properties.name: InputParallelism
properties.description: Describes the number of in-application streams to create.

type.description: Describes the number of in-application streams to create.

properties.name: InputProcessingConfiguration
properties.description: The InputProcessingConfiguration for the input. An input processor transforms records as they are received from the stream, before the application's SQL code executes. Currently, the only input processing configuration available is InputLambdaProcessor.

type.description: The InputProcessingConfiguration for the input. An input processor transforms records as they are received from the stream, before the application's SQL code executes. Currently, the only input processing configuration available is InputLambdaProcessor.

properties.name: InputSchema
properties.description: Describes the format of the data in the streaming source, and how each data element maps to corresponding columns in the in-application stream that is being created.

type.description: Describes the format of the data in the streaming source, and how each data element maps to corresponding columns in the in-application stream that is being created.

properties.name: KinesisFirehoseInput
properties.description: If the streaming source is an Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream, identifies the delivery stream's ARN.

type.description: If the streaming source is an Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream, identifies the delivery stream's ARN.

properties.name: KinesisStreamsInput
properties.description: If the streaming source is an Amazon Kinesis data stream, identifies the stream's Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

type.description: If the streaming source is an Amazon Kinesis data stream, identifies the stream's Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

properties.name: NamePrefix
properties.description: The name prefix to use when creating an in-application stream. Suppose that you specify a prefix `"MyInApplicationStream"`. Kinesis Data Analytics then creates one or more (as per the InputParallelism count you specified) in-application streams with the names `"MyInApplicationStream_001"`, `"MyInApplicationStream_002"`, and so on.

type.description: The name prefix to use when creating an in-application stream. Suppose that you specify a prefix `"MyInApplicationStream"`. Kinesis Data Analytics then creates one or more (as per the InputParallelism count you specified) in-application streams with the names `"MyInApplicationStream_001"`, `"MyInApplicationStream_002"`, and so on.

InputLambdaProcessor.description: An object that contains the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Lambda function that is used to preprocess records in the stream in a SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

properties.name: ResourceARN
properties.description: The ARN of the Amazon Lambda function that operates on records in the stream.

type.description: The ARN of the Amazon Lambda function that operates on records in the stream.

InputParallelism.description: For a SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application, describes the number of in-application streams to create for a given streaming source.

properties.name: Count
properties.description: The number of in-application streams to create.

type.description: The number of in-application streams to create.

InputProcessingConfiguration.description: For an SQL-based Amazon Kinesis Data Analytics application, describes a processor that is used to preprocess the records in the stream before being processed by your application code. Currently, the only input processor available is Amazon Lambda.

properties.name: InputLambdaProcessor
properties.description: The InputLambdaProcessor that is used to preprocess the records in the stream before being processed by your application code.

type.description: The InputLambdaProcessor that is used to preprocess the records in the stream before being processed by your application code.

InputSchema.description: For a SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application, describes the format of the data in the streaming source, and how each data element maps to corresponding columns created in the in-application stream.

properties.name: RecordColumns
properties.description: A list of `RecordColumn` objects.

type.description: A list of `RecordColumn` objects.

properties.name: RecordEncoding
properties.description: Specifies the encoding of the records in the streaming source. For example, UTF-8.

type.description: Specifies the encoding of the records in the streaming source. For example, UTF-8.

properties.name: RecordFormat
properties.description: Specifies the format of the records on the streaming source.

type.description: Specifies the format of the records on the streaming source.

JSONMappingParameters.description: For a SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application, provides additional mapping information when JSON is the record format on the streaming source.

properties.name: RecordRowPath
properties.description: The path to the top-level parent that contains the records.

type.description: The path to the top-level parent that contains the records.

KinesisFirehoseInput.description: For a SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application, identifies a Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream as the streaming source. You provide the delivery stream's Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

properties.name: ResourceARN
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the delivery stream.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the delivery stream.

KinesisStreamsInput.description: Identifies a Kinesis data stream as the streaming source. You provide the stream's Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

properties.name: ResourceARN
properties.description: The ARN of the input Kinesis data stream to read.

type.description: The ARN of the input Kinesis data stream to read.

MappingParameters.description: When you configure a SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application's input at the time of creating or updating an application, provides additional mapping information specific to the record format (such as JSON, CSV, or record fields delimited by some delimiter) on the streaming source.

properties.name: CSVMappingParameters
properties.description: Provides additional mapping information when the record format uses delimiters (for example, CSV).

type.description: Provides additional mapping information when the record format uses delimiters (for example, CSV).

properties.name: JSONMappingParameters
properties.description: Provides additional mapping information when JSON is the record format on the streaming source.

type.description: Provides additional mapping information when JSON is the record format on the streaming source.

MavenReference.description: The information required to specify a Maven reference. You can use Maven references to specify dependency JAR files.

properties.name: ArtifactId
properties.description: The artifact ID of the Maven reference.

type.description: The artifact ID of the Maven reference.

properties.name: GroupId
properties.description: The group ID of the Maven reference.

type.description: The group ID of the Maven reference.

properties.name: Version
properties.description: The version of the Maven reference.

type.description: The version of the Maven reference.

MonitoringConfiguration.description: Describes configuration parameters for Amazon CloudWatch logging for a Java-based Kinesis Data Analytics application. For more information about CloudWatch logging, see Monitoring.

properties.name: ConfigurationType
properties.description: Describes whether to use the default CloudWatch logging configuration for an application. You must set this property to CUSTOM in order to set the LogLevel or MetricsLevel parameters.

type.description: Describes whether to use the default CloudWatch logging configuration for an application. You must set this property to CUSTOM in order to set the LogLevel or MetricsLevel parameters.

properties.name: LogLevel
properties.description: Describes the verbosity of the CloudWatch Logs for an application.

type.description: Describes the verbosity of the CloudWatch Logs for an application.

properties.name: MetricsLevel
properties.description: Describes the granularity of the CloudWatch Logs for an application. The Parallelism level is not recommended for applications with a Parallelism over 64 due to excessive costs.

type.description: Describes the granularity of the CloudWatch Logs for an application. The Parallelism level is not recommended for applications with a Parallelism over 64 due to excessive costs.

ParallelismConfiguration.description: Describes parameters for how a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application executes multiple tasks simultaneously. For more information about parallelism, see Parallel Execution in the Apache Flink Documentation

properties.name: AutoScalingEnabled
properties.description: Describes whether the Kinesis Data Analytics service can increase the parallelism of the application in response to increased throughput.

type.description: Describes whether the Kinesis Data Analytics service can increase the parallelism of the application in response to increased throughput.

properties.name: ConfigurationType
properties.description: Describes whether the application uses the default parallelism for the Kinesis Data Analytics service. You must set this property to `CUSTOM` in order to change your application's `AutoScalingEnabled`, `Parallelism`, or `ParallelismPerKPU` properties.

type.description: Describes whether the application uses the default parallelism for the Kinesis Data Analytics service. You must set this property to `CUSTOM` in order to change your application's `AutoScalingEnabled`, `Parallelism`, or `ParallelismPerKPU` properties.

properties.name: Parallelism
properties.description: Describes the initial number of parallel tasks that a Java-based Kinesis Data Analytics application can perform. The Kinesis Data Analytics service can increase this number automatically if ParallelismConfiguration:AutoScalingEnabled is set to true.

type.description: Describes the initial number of parallel tasks that a Java-based Kinesis Data Analytics application can perform. The Kinesis Data Analytics service can increase this number automatically if ParallelismConfiguration:AutoScalingEnabled is set to true.

properties.name: ParallelismPerKPU
properties.description: Describes the number of parallel tasks that a Java-based Kinesis Data Analytics application can perform per Kinesis Processing Unit (KPU) used by the application. For more information about KPUs, see Amazon Kinesis Data Analytics Pricing.

type.description: Describes the number of parallel tasks that a Java-based Kinesis Data Analytics application can perform per Kinesis Processing Unit (KPU) used by the application. For more information about KPUs, see Amazon Kinesis Data Analytics Pricing.

PropertyGroup.description: Property key-value pairs passed into an application.

properties.name: PropertyGroupId
properties.description: Describes the key of an application execution property key-value pair.

type.description: Describes the key of an application execution property key-value pair.

properties.name: PropertyMap
properties.description: Describes the value of an application execution property key-value pair.

type.description: Describes the value of an application execution property key-value pair.

RecordColumn.description:
For a SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application, describes the mapping of each data element in the streaming source to the corresponding column in the in-application stream.
Also used to describe the format of the reference data source.

properties.name: Mapping
properties.description: A reference to the data element in the streaming input or the reference data source.

type.description: A reference to the data element in the streaming input or the reference data source.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the column that is created in the in-application input stream or reference table.

type.description: The name of the column that is created in the in-application input stream or reference table.

properties.name: SqlType
properties.description: The type of column created in the in-application input stream or reference table.

type.description: The type of column created in the in-application input stream or reference table.

RecordFormat.description: For a SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application, describes the record format and relevant mapping information that should be applied to schematize the records on the stream.

properties.name: MappingParameters
properties.description: When you configure application input at the time of creating or updating an application, provides additional mapping information specific to the record format (such as JSON, CSV, or record fields delimited by some delimiter) on the streaming source.

type.description: When you configure application input at the time of creating or updating an application, provides additional mapping information specific to the record format (such as JSON, CSV, or record fields delimited by some delimiter) on the streaming source.

properties.name: RecordFormatType
properties.description: The type of record format.

type.description: The type of record format.

RunConfiguration.description: Identifies the run configuration (start parameters) of a Kinesis Data Analytics application. This section is evaluated only on stack updates for applications in running RUNNING state and has no effect during manual application start.

properties.name: ApplicationRestoreConfiguration
properties.description: Describes the restore behavior of a restarting application.

type.description: Describes the restore behavior of a restarting application.

properties.name: FlinkRunConfiguration
properties.description: Describes the starting parameters for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

type.description: Describes the starting parameters for a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

S3ContentBaseLocation.description: The base location of the Amazon Data Analytics application.

properties.name: BasePath
properties.description: The base path for the S3 bucket.

type.description: The base path for the S3 bucket.

properties.name: BucketARN
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the S3 bucket.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the S3 bucket.

S3ContentLocation.description: The location of an application or a custom artifact.

properties.name: BucketARN
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the S3 bucket containing the application code.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the S3 bucket containing the application code.

properties.name: FileKey
properties.description: The file key for the object containing the application code.

type.description: The file key for the object containing the application code.

properties.name: ObjectVersion
properties.description: The version of the object containing the application code.

type.description: The version of the object containing the application code.

SqlApplicationConfiguration.description: Describes the inputs, outputs, and reference data sources for a SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

properties.name: Inputs
properties.description: The array of Input objects describing the input streams used by the application.

type.description: The array of Input objects describing the input streams used by the application.

Tag.description: A key-value pair that identifies an application.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that's 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that's 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that's 0 to 256 characters in length.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that's 0 to 256 characters in length.

VpcConfiguration.description: Describes the parameters of a VPC used by the application.

properties.name: SecurityGroupIds
properties.description: The array of SecurityGroup IDs used by the VPC configuration.

type.description: The array of SecurityGroup IDs used by the VPC configuration.

properties.name: SubnetIds
properties.description: The array of Subnet IDs used by the VPC configuration.

type.description: The array of Subnet IDs used by the VPC configuration.

VpcConfigurations.description: The array of descriptions of VPC configurations available to the application.

itemType.description: Describes the parameters of a VPC used by the application.

ZeppelinApplicationConfiguration.description: The configuration of a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook.

properties.name: CatalogConfiguration
properties.description: The Amazon Glue Data Catalog that you use in queries in a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook.

type.description: The Amazon Glue Data Catalog that you use in queries in a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook.

properties.name: CustomArtifactsConfiguration
properties.description: A list of CustomArtifactConfiguration objects.

type.description: A list of CustomArtifactConfiguration objects.

properties.name: DeployAsApplicationConfiguration
properties.description: The information required to deploy a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook as an application with durable state.

type.description: The information required to deploy a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook as an application with durable state.

properties.name: MonitoringConfiguration
properties.description: The monitoring configuration of a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook.

type.description: The monitoring configuration of a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook.

ZeppelinMonitoringConfiguration.description: Describes configuration parameters for Amazon CloudWatch logging for a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook. For more information about CloudWatch logging, see Monitoring.

properties.name: LogLevel
properties.description: The verbosity of the CloudWatch Logs for an application. You can set it to `INFO`, `WARN`, `ERROR`, or `DEBUG`.

type.description: The verbosity of the CloudWatch Logs for an application. You can set it to `INFO`, `WARN`, `ERROR`, or `DEBUG`.

resource.description: Creates an Amazon Kinesis Data Analytics application. For information about creating a Kinesis Data Analytics application, see [Creating an Application](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/kinesisanalytics/latest/java/getting-started.html).

properties.name: ApplicationConfiguration
properties.description: Use this parameter to configure the application.

type.description: Use this parameter to configure the application.

properties.name: ApplicationDescription
properties.description: The description of the application.

type.description: The description of the application.

properties.name: ApplicationMaintenanceConfiguration
properties.description: Used to configure start of maintenance window.

type.description: Used to configure start of maintenance window.

properties.name: ApplicationMode
properties.description: To create a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook, you must set the mode to `INTERACTIVE`. However, for a Kinesis Data Analytics for Apache Flink application, the mode is optional.

type.description: To create a Kinesis Data Analytics Studio notebook, you must set the mode to `INTERACTIVE`. However, for a Kinesis Data Analytics for Apache Flink application, the mode is optional.

properties.name: ApplicationName
properties.description: The name of the application.

type.description: The name of the application.

properties.name: RunConfiguration
properties.description: Specifies run configuration (start parameters) of a Kinesis Data Analytics application. Evaluated on update for RUNNING applications an only.

type.description: Specifies run configuration (start parameters) of a Kinesis Data Analytics application. Evaluated on update for RUNNING applications an only.

properties.name: RuntimeEnvironment
properties.description: The runtime environment for the application.

type.description: The runtime environment for the application.

properties.name: ServiceExecutionRole
properties.description: Specifies the IAM role that the application uses to access external resources.

type.description: Specifies the IAM role that the application uses to access external resources.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A list of one or more tags to assign to the application. A tag is a key-value pair that identifies an application. Note that the maximum number of application tags includes system tags. The maximum number of user-defined application tags is 50.

type.description: A list of one or more tags to assign to the application. A tag is a key-value pair that identifies an application. Note that the maximum number of application tags includes system tags. The maximum number of user-defined application tags is 50.
